DOC.brief_summary: Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) Study Elderly Outpatients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) . Current major depressive episode screen least 2 month duration . Must least 60 year age . Patients primary diagnosis MDD . Patients history schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder dementia . Patients history brief depressive episode last less 8 week . Patients receive formal psychotherapy within 12 week study . Patients suicidal . Patients receive electroconvulsive therapy transcranial magnetic stimulation within 6 month prior screen . Patients history seizure disorder .
